vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χορτ-άζω,
feed, fatten, properly of cattle [Refs 8th c.BC+]; χορτάσω τὸν κάνθαρον (the beetle being comically treated as a horse), [Refs 5th c.BC+]; with accusative of things, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, eat their fill, of cattle, [Refs]; τινος of a thing, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II of persons, feed, βολβοῖς ἐμαυτὸν χορτάσω [Refs 4th c.BC+]: with genitive, fill full of.., θεράπευε καὶ χόρταζε τῶν μονῳδιῶν (metaphorically) [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, with accusative, χορταζόμενοι γάλα λευκόν [LXX+5th c.BC+]: absolutely, feast, κεχόρτασμαι.. οὐ κακῶς [NT+4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to feed; (passive) to be filled to satisfaction, eat one’s fill
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to feed; (passive) to be filled to satisfaction, eat one’s fill
primarily to feed or fill with grass, herbage, etc., to fatten; used of animals of prey, to satiate, gorge, Rev. 19:21; of persons, to satisfy with food, Mt. 14:20; 15:33, 37; metaphorically to satisfy the desire of any one, Mt. 5:6
vocabInfos._es_Definition: alimentar, satisfacer ; (voz pasiva) estar satisfecho, comer hasta no poder más
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 餵養, 用食物充滿
1a) 動物 (啟 19:21)
1b) 人
3) 內在被滿足 (太 5:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 喂养, 用食物充满
1a) 动物 (启 19:21)
1b) 人
3) 内在被满足 (太 5:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: được ăn no nê; thỏa mãn
